H0.text: Yogurt is made with the help of bacteria.

H1.text: Cream is made with the help of bacteria.

H2.text: Soap is made with the help of bacteria.

H3.text: Cooking oil is made with the help of bacteria.

A4.text: Yogurt production involves inoculating certain bacteria (starter culture), usually Streptococcus thermophilus and Lactobacillus bulgaricus, into the milk.
